title: About Refunding champion.
body: Hello everyone , Actually I'm new in league of legend and in beginning I had bought 3 champions and I sold all of em cuz I didn't know the limit. Now I wanna ask  when will be this limit finish I mean when I can Refund my champions now ?

replies.body: As DTN mentioned, each account has 3 tokens they may use to refund eligible items.  Currently, there's no method of earning additional tokens.  We have a [Refund FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) that can shed some more light on how refunds work.  Please let me know if you have any questions, and I'd be happy to clarify.  Welcome to League of Legends!

You only get 3 refund tokens on your account ever. Once you use those 3, you will be unable to refund anything else. Triple check that you are purchasing content that you want before you do so, because it's going to be permanent.

If you need advice on purchases, feel free to post on the forums to ask.
I got it . Thank u so much ! Y
